title.rendered: Tokyo FinTech Podcast with Tokeny Solutions CEO

content.rendered:
‎Our CEO Luc Falempin interviewed by Norbert Gehrke from Tokyo FinTech Podcast. Listen to the podcast to hear about:

  • The European landscape for #securitytokens
  • The need for onchain identity
  • Solutions for issuing, transferring and managing security tokens
  • The reason we chose public Ethereum blockchain
  • The secondary market for security tokens
[vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html]
